experience.title: HR Administrator
experience.description:
Main task is to act as the sole point of contact between the Hyderabad H.O and Bangalore unit with regards to all the HR and Administration activities which includes :


·       Visa coordination

.       Heading the employee engagement activities

.       Managing petty cash

.       Assist the Director of Bangalore unit with regards to important documents

.	Point of contact for all the HR related queries in Bangalore unit

.       Coordinate communication with candidates and schedule interviews

·       Handling the employee joining formalities

.       Handling the exit formalities

·       Compiling and update employee records (hard and soft copies)

·       Account opening for new joiners.

·       General office administration

.       Assisting the travel desk

·       Coordinating logistics

·       Verifying suppliers bills and forwarding the authorized bills to accounts dept for payment.

.       Vendor contract,renewal of contracts,bills verification,bills certification,followup of bills.

·       Keeping books for all petty cash expenses and approvals and submission of bills to 

        accounts

·       Maintain proper record of company assets issued to marketing personnel and ensure 

        accountability.

·       To deal with vendors/service providers like suppliers, courier, manpower consultants etc.

experience.title: HR Intern
experience.description: I had an opportunity to work as an as intern in Black Turtle, an executive search firm which is into senior level hiring. My responsibilities include understanding the various aspects of recruiting procedures especially sourcing , screening , contacting as well as follow up on prospective candidates, interview coordination and closing deals by helping the candidates to complete their on boarding processes by working as a contact person between the candidate and client. I also had an opportunity to have a study about the employee engagement activities followed by the company.

positions.subtitle: PhonePe
positions.description: Involved in building the app support team from scratch. As part of my role, I was fortunate to be a part of some highly scalable and technically challenging systems such as Chimera (Config Engine), Jarvis (Smart link, CTAs and Scripting Engine), Bazooka )App Release Management) and troubleshooting issues for PhonePe Payments App, Pincode, Indus App Bazaar and Share Market. My primary responsibilities included understanding the systems and their capabilities in depth and leveraging them for business and product needs. I worked closely with ops teams to help them configure offers, set up campaigns and workflows, and extract business reports. I also interacted with the developers in the team to understand the system further, escalate critical customer issues to them after having done the first level analysis myself, and partner with them to develop new constructs and platform requirements. As the role requires stakeholder management, effective communication and organizing skills were a must. To excel in this role, I honed my technical skill sets to include basic scripting, database fundamentals, PS DS, event-based messaging services, data structures, and problem-solving. Overall, the experience was challenging yet rewarding, and I developed a deeper understanding of the tech landscape, stakeholder management, and effective communication skills while working with Chimera, Jarvis, Bazooka and troubleshooting for PhonePe along with its sister apps like Pincode, Share Market, Indus AppBazaar and PhonePe Business app.
positions.title: Apps Team - Product Solutions

As part of my role, I was fortunate to be a part of some highly scalable and technically challenging systems such as Chimera (Config Engine), Jarvis (Smart link, CTAs and Scripting Engine), Bazooka )App Release Management) and troubleshooting issues for PhonePe Payments App, Pincode, Indus App Bazaar and Share Market.

My primary responsibilities included understanding the systems and their capabilities in depth and leveraging them for business and product needs. I worked closely with ops teams to help them configure offers, set up campaigns and workflows, and extract business reports.

I also interacted with the developers in the team to understand the system further, escalate critical customer issues to them after having done the first level analysis myself, and partner with them to develop new constructs and platform requirements.

As the role requires stakeholder management, effective communication and organizing skills were a must. To excel in this role, I honed my technical skill sets to include basic scripting, database fundamentals, PS DS, event-based messaging services, data structures, and problem-solving.

Overall, the experience was challenging yet rewarding, and I developed a deeper understanding of the tech landscape, stakeholder management, and effective communication skills while working with Chimera, Jarvis, Bazooka and troubleshooting for PhonePe along with its sister apps like Pincode, Share Market, Indus AppBazaar and PhonePe Business app.

positions.subtitle: PhonePe
positions.description: Android App Development - Joined PhonePe as the first apps developer. I was involved in core android app development for the first two years During my time at PhonePe developer, I was involved in the development of the PhonePe Android app - a Unified Payment Interface (UPI) app, with a user base of more than 600 million and a rating of 4.5. I started by building a sample PhonePe MVP app with P2P, split, and recharge mocks, which only took two weeks to develop. For the main PhonePe Android app, we divided it into three modules using the model-view-presenter pattern - PhonePe Core, Network Client, and the PhonePe app. I leveraged Dagger-2 for injection and butterKnife. As a result of my work on all of these modules, I was able to develop quite a few essential features utilised in the PhonePe app. Some of the functionalities and features I worked on during my time at PhonePe include Recharge and Data-card implementation, User-Profile Page design, Saved Cards Management, Contacts Management, Invite Friends, Split-a-bill Feature, Missed Payment Feature, Remind Functionality, Recent Contacts and Recent Plans, Call-me-back Functionality, Scan QR Code - Import from Gallery feature, Back-Press Handling - State machine, Helpshift Integration, Tune and Facebook SDK Events Integration, and Foxtrot Events Integration. Notably, I was able to develop and add end-to-end features for mobile recharge and data-card, including detection of operator and circle of a particular number from the TRAI database. I also worked on the management of user data, which included UPI IDs and address of the user, created a screen that showed saved cards and allowed delete operation, developed a page that had stored VPAs and bank accounts added while sending money, and added an 'Invite' button that opened an intent to send invites to contacts via WhatsApp, Messenger, SMS, and more.
positions.title: Apps Team - Android Dev
positions.description_html:
Android App Development - Joined PhonePe as the first apps developer. I was involved in core android app development for the first two years

During my time at PhonePe developer, I was involved in the development of the PhonePe Android app - a Unified Payment Interface (UPI) app, with a user base of more than 600 million and a rating of 4.5. I started by building a sample PhonePe MVP app with P2P, split, and recharge mocks, which only took two weeks to develop. For the main PhonePe Android app, we divided it into three modules using the model-view-presenter pattern - PhonePe Core, Network Client, and the PhonePe app. I leveraged Dagger-2 for injection and butterKnife. As a result of my work on all of these modules, I was able to develop quite a few essential features utilised in the PhonePe app.

Some of the functionalities and features I worked on during my time at PhonePe include Recharge and Data-card implementation, User-Profile Page design, Saved Cards Management, Contacts Management, Invite Friends, Split-a-bill Feature, Missed Payment Feature, Remind Functionality, Recent Contacts and Recent Plans, Call-me-back Functionality, Scan QR Code - Import from Gallery feature, Back-Press Handling - State machine, Helpshift Integration, Tune and Facebook SDK Events Integration, and Foxtrot Events Integration. Notably, I was able to develop and add end-to-end features for mobile recharge and data-card, including detection of operator and circle of a particular number from the TRAI database. I also worked on the management of user data, which included UPI IDs and address of the user, created a screen that showed saved cards and allowed delete operation, developed a page that had stored VPAs and bank accounts added while sending money, and added an 'Invite' button that opened an intent to send invites to contacts via WhatsApp, Messenger, SMS, and more.

experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description:
As a Co-Founder of Pecfly Internet Private Limited, my vision was to create a platform that provides a simple and hassle-free experience for trading second-hand goods. Our goal at Pecfly is to offer an interactive and enjoyable way for users to sell their used items.


To achieve this, my team and I developed an Android app called Pecfly. The app has been a great success with over 10K+ downloads on the Google Play Store. In addition to the primary product, I learned how to analyze user behavior which allowed us to provide effective fulfilment services to keep both buyers and sellers satisfied.


I also led in the development of the Pecfly Android app, incorporating various features such as a location manager, user-chat, swipe gestures, and integrating it with third-party tools like Crashanlytics, Mixpanel, and Appengage to enhance the user experience and improve functionality.


Moreover, we experimented with a virtual currency model, enabling users to sell unwanted items and receive coins that they could use to purchase items listed by other users, which has received an overwhelmingly positive response.
experience.description_html:
As a Co-Founder of Pecfly Internet Private Limited, my vision was to create a platform that provides a simple and hassle-free experience for trading second-hand goods. Our goal at Pecfly is to offer an interactive and enjoyable way for users to sell their used items.

To achieve this, my team and I developed an Android app called Pecfly. The app has been a great success with over 10K+ downloads on the Google Play Store. In addition to the primary product, I learned how to analyze user behavior which allowed us to provide effective fulfilment services to keep both buyers and sellers satisfied.

I also led in the development of the Pecfly Android app, incorporating various features such as a location manager, user-chat, swipe gestures, and integrating it with third-party tools like Crashanlytics, Mixpanel, and Appengage to enhance the user experience and improve functionality.

Moreover, we experimented with a virtual currency model, enabling users to sell unwanted items and receive coins that they could use to purchase items listed by other users, which has received an overwhelmingly positive response.

detailed_profile.name: Anil Kumar Passi
detailed_profile.about: As a dynamic professional with over 20 years of experience, I specialize in delivering high-impact products and managing complex technical programs across the BFSI domain and global markets. My passion lies in driving successful outcomes through Agile methodologies, fostering collaboration among cross-functional teams, and ensuring alignment with strategic business goals. Whether guiding product development from concept to launch, orchestrating large-scale technical programs, or streamlining delivery processes, I focus on innovation, efficiency, and continuous improvement to maximize customer satisfaction and business value. Key strengths include: Leading cross-functional teams to deliver exceptional products and services in both technical and business domains. Deep expertise in Agile practices, Scrum ceremonies, technical program management, and release planning. Proven track record of managing global programs, including technical integrations and complex product initiatives, from ideation to execution. Skilled in stakeholder management, fostering transparency, collaboration, and technical alignment. Certified in CSPO®, MSP®, PMI-PMP®, and SAFe®, with a deep understanding of SDLC, risk mitigation, technical roadmapping, and team empowerment. recommendations: Savita Angadi “I was Navneet’s mentor during his tenure with TRDDC. I found him to be a hard worker and self-motivated. He was passionate about everything. He had good understanding of analytics. I recollect how much he was commitment towards his work. He is the best team player that I ever seen. Added to that he was good at managing the team as team lead too! He was one person that I can trust on any of the assignment that I am committed to. He was acquaint with state of art not only in analytics but across the fields. Quite hard to find a person like him. No doubt he will be the asset to the team. Looking forward to work with him again. ”

Naren Chittar “I managed Navneet for over an year. He helped build eBay's first autocomplete system. He then moved on to improving our query recommendation product and within a few weeks fixed the most common complaints pertaining to the quality of the system. What this says is that Navneet is a very versatile applied researcher and can move between products very easily. He can also identify what is important in a product from a user's point of view -- many engineers and applied researchers cannot do that. He is also a very level headed, calm and collected person. If you have a stressful, hi priority project you want to assign, you can be sure that Navneet will handle it in a very balanced and mature way all through out. He was always the first person for anyone in the team to go to when they had questions or needed feedback.”

detailed_profile.about: As a Business Analyst at Tata Consultancy Services, I apply my marketing analytics expertise and MBA knowledge to deliver quality solutions for various clients and projects. I use Office 365, Jile, and Prime tools to implement test cases, execute tests, and identify critical issues using agile methodologies. I also collaborate with the value streams and marketing team to inform and develop marketing strategies based on data analysis and interpretation. Before joining TCS, I worked as a Marketing Analyst at the same company, where I performed behavioral analysis and market research for different business opportunities and development. I also worked as a Key Account Executive at PhonePe, a leading digital payments platform, where I managed and grew a portfolio of key merchants and partners. I completed my internship in digital marketing, market research, business development, and content strategy at various organizations. I hold a MBA degree in Marketing and Operations from Army Institute of Management, Kolkata, where I was the General Secretary of Placement. I also have a B.Tech degree in Civil Engineering from Narula Institute of Technology, and certifications in Auto CAD and STADD Pro from Bentley Systems. I am confident, honest, sincere, organized, punctual, and affable. I enjoy learning new skills and technologies, and I am always eager to take on new challenges and opportunities. I value teamwork, innovation, and customer satisfaction. My goal is to leverage my education, experience, and skills to create value for my clients and company, and to grow as a professional and a leader.

detailed_profile.name: Anuj Tiwari
detailed_profile.position: 🚀 Backend Engineer @ PhonePe | Java & Python | Microservices & API Development | Product & Business Thinker | Problem Solver | Storyteller | Runner | Always Learning
detailed_profile.about: 🚀 Backend Engineer | Product & Business Understanding | Scalable Systems I am a Backend Engineer at PhonePe, passionate about building scalable, high-performance systems and developing impactful features that drive business growth. My expertise spans Java, Python, Microservices, API Development, and System Optimization, allowing me to contribute meaningfully to product development. Beyond just writing code, I have a deep understanding of Product Management and how new projects and features are developed. Having recently completed a Product Management course, I have gained valuable insights into requirement gathering, stakeholder collaboration, and product lifecycle management. This enables me to bridge the gap between technology and business, ensuring that what we build aligns with strategic goals. 🔹 Core Skills & Expertise: ✅ Backend Engineering: Java, Python, Microservices, API Development ✅ Data Engineering: SSIS, SSMS, Data Pipelines, Power BI, SQL, T-SQL ✅ System Optimization & Automation: Writing scripts, performance tuning ✅ Product & Business Understanding: Product lifecycle, feature development, stakeholder communication ✅ Cross-Team Collaboration: Working across multiple teams and stakeholders to drive impactful solutions I take pride in my ability to effectively communicate complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders. My strong problem-solving mindset, adaptability, and strategic thinking help me deliver high-quality solutions that align with business objectives. I thrive in fast-paced environments, continuously learning and growing—whether it's exploring new technologies like Starburst or diving into books on personal and professional development. 📩 Let’s connect! Always open to discussing backend engineering, product strategy, and new opportunities.

experience.title: Product Solution Engineer
experience.description:
- Use my analytics, Java, and Python skills to solve problems from start to finish.

- Design and build internal systems to make BAU (Business As Usual) processes faster and more efficient.

- Write and optimize code to fix critical bugs and keep systems running smoothly using Python Automation skills.

- Create new workflows to introduce exciting features and improvements using Java Dropwizard Framework.

- Implementing engineering improvements to help the system handle unexpected failures more effectively. These enhancements also protect the system from sudden issues, reducing downtime and ensuring smoother operations during emergencies

detailed_profile.name: Anuj Tiwari
detailed_profile.position: 🚀 Backend Engineer @ PhonePe | Java & Python | Microservices & API Development | Product & Business Thinker | Problem Solver | Storyteller | Runner | Always Learning
detailed_profile.about: 🚀 Backend Engineer | Product & Business Understanding | Scalable Systems I am a Backend Engineer at PhonePe, passionate about building scalable, high-performance systems and developing impactful features that drive business growth. My expertise spans Java, Python, Microservices, API Development, and System Optimization, allowing me to contribute meaningfully to product development. Beyond just writing code, I have a deep understanding of Product Management and how new projects and features are developed. Having recently completed a Product Management course, I have gained valuable insights into requirement gathering, stakeholder collaboration, and product lifecycle management. This enables me to bridge the gap between technology and business, ensuring that what we build aligns with strategic goals. 🔹 Core Skills & Expertise: ✅ Backend Engineering: Java, Python, Microservices, API Development ✅ Data Engineering: SSIS, SSMS, Data Pipelines, Power BI, SQL, T-SQL ✅ System Optimization & Automation: Writing scripts, performance tuning ✅ Product & Business Understanding: Product lifecycle, feature development, stakeholder communication ✅ Cross-Team Collaboration: Working across multiple teams and stakeholders to drive impactful solutions I take pride in my ability to effectively communicate complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders. My strong problem-solving mindset, adaptability, and strategic thinking help me deliver high-quality solutions that align with business objectives. I thrive in fast-paced environments, continuously learning and growing—whether it's exploring new technologies like Starburst or diving into books on personal and professional development. 📩 Let’s connect! Always open to discussing backend engineering, product strategy, and new opportunities.

projects.title: Fault tolerant Message Bus
projects.description: * Massive scale fault tolerant message bus with HTTP abstractions* Backpressure management* Automatic/Transparent retries* Multiple messaging models (PubSub, PushPull)* Automatic Sidelining* Re-play Support

projects.title: Mobile Image Delivery
projects.description: * Smart delivery of images based on device form factor, network conditions* Progressive rendering* Image quality control* Image resize can leverage hardware acceleration* Average throughput per day 2 terabytes* Bandwidth optimization for mobile devices

projects.title: FlipSync - Mobile scale data sync
projects.description: Mobile scale data sync platform for providing disconnected mode experience- Dynamic schema support (Schema free)- Support hierarchical data (Relationships)- Multi tenant- Support for HTML5, Android, iOS (native clients)- Transparent CRUD RESTful API- Horizontally scalable datastore (MongoDB)

projects.title: FlipCast - Mobile scale push notification platform
projects.description: Platform & Service for sending push notifications to mobile devices- Supports Android, iOS & Windows Phone- Supports intelligent batching- Unicast, Multicast & Broadcast support- Horizontally scalable - Multitenent- Adaptive retry and backoff- Automatic backpressure management

projects.title: Distributed Storage Platform - Version 1.0
projects.description: Web scale fault tolerant distributed storage platform for digital media- Storage 100s of million files transparently- RESTful access to files- Highly scalable metadata store for maintaining file metadata- Location transparency to clients- Highly concurrent fault tolerant design through akka.io- Optimized file/network services through nio and nio.2

projects.title: Internet Scale TimeSeries Data Distribution & Analytics Platform
projects.description: The platform is a hierarchical arrangement of clusters. With each cluster having the following parts1) Data Sourcing Cluster - 500+ Data Adapters in Failover configurations switching in milliseconds on failure.2) HBase DataStore Cluster fora) Market Data - quote and trade-related data associated with equity, fixed-income, financial derivatives, currency, and other investment instrumentsb) Reference Data - static data other than market datac) Customer Transaction Data3) Licensing Server w/ Clustered MySQL4) DownStream Cluster - Loadbalanced Jetty Servers with Rest/Json and Websockets(Text+binary) protocols serving realtime data and queries5) ZooKeeper - Cluster ManagementThe platform serves Analytics Needs and Data Distribution Needs at Internet Scale

projects.title: Raptor
projects.description: I lead the team that developed Raptor - Realtime Hadoop Analytics. Which was presented at Hadoop World 2011(New York). http://www.hadoopworld.com/session/raptor-real-time-analytics-on-hadoop/Raptor is a real-time analytics product that processes data 10x times faster than Hadoop. Raptor combines Hadoop & HBase with machine learning models for adaptive data segmentation, partitioning, bucketing, and filtering to enable ad-hoc queries and real-time analytics. It has intelligent optimization algorithms that switch query execution between Raptor, HBase and MapReduce, and can create per-block dynamic bloom filters for adaptive filtering. A policy manager allows optimized indexing and autosharding.

projects.title: Valli - Sync & Mobile Experience Platform
projects.description: Valli Sync provides seamless data synchronization platform for systems, devices and applications. A highly scalable server platform exposes REST API (JSON/XML) for synchronizing data between any two data source. The client framework supports most popular mobile (iOS/Android/WP 7/Blackberry) and desktop platforms (Chrome/Safari) with HTML5. Server platform includes support for many RDBMS data stores (Oracle/SQL Server/MySQL/PostgreSQL) and SOAP/REST services. Easily pluggable custom adaptors for bespoke data sources are supported. Code generator tool chain is bundled along with the framework to generate the plumbing code that is required for metadata exchange, offline data access layer and server adaptors to increase developer productivity and to reduce development time. Valli platform allows declaratively specifying metadata, which will be used by server and the client to provide zero-code synchronization on the client. The REST API is compatible with all programming language platforms that support HTTP.

projects.title: Scale out ETL platform
projects.description: ETL Platform for digital catalog & content ingestion pipeline- Scale out architecture- Transparent retry & sidelining- Asymmetric scaling through job control- Job chaining - Fork and Join support- Auto discovery and co-ordination

projects.title: Project: Occam's Razor
projects.description: Principle(s):(1) The Principle of Plurality - Plurality should not be posited without necessity(2) The Principle of Parsimony - It is pointless to do with more what is done with lessTaken together, they represent the basis of humanity's investigation into the universe, and the way we see our environment is largely based upon Occam's razor.Practice Motto: Simplest Solutions to the Worlds Most Complex ProblemsPractice(s):(1) Quantitative Finance, or(2) Machine Learning/Statistics/Data Science/Data MiningFoundation(s):(1) Numerical Linear Algebra(2) Partial Differential Equations of Applied Mathematics(3) Numerical Optimization(4) Discrete Mathematics and Algorithms(5) Numerical Solution of Partial Differential Equations(6) Stochastic Methods in Engineering

projects.title: Stealers - Concurrent Programming Framework
projects.description: Stealers aims to be the fastest Trading Platform Core & Stream Processing Core in the world. And is a general purpose mechanism for solving concurrency problems. Stealers is not only Fast it is perhaps the Fastest Concurrency Framework around.DesignStealers doesn't use Queues or even Fixed Size Ring Buffers. It was designed from ground up to utilize Unlimited Memory (Maximum Physical RAM), be resilient to Jitter & Garbage Collection & Overflows, and have an absolute 0 message loss at any load or throughput level. Stealers was designed according to Lean Manufacturing principles to maximise throughput and and not try to maximize thread utilization. The latter is what causes extreme contention.Benchmark & ApplicationsIt beats LMAX/Disruptor by 4x times (correction 6.5x times as of Mar'12) on a regular core i7 desktop where it does a sustained 79m ops/sec compared to about 25m ops/sec with disruptor. And when setup in a 100P-200C configuration delivers a Total System Throughput of 1,035 million ops/second with 40+ Cores, 128+ GB RAM and less than 1ms latency. Stealers is being used in Trading Systems and Internet Scale Stream Processing (Realtime MapReduce) and Distributed Platforms.

projects.title: Multi-GPGPU MaxOut Framework
projects.description: Typical Servers have 4-8 GPGPU's attached to them for hardware acceleration. GPGPU's are notorious for being under utilized. the MaxOut framework allows maximum utilization of GPGPU's (AMD, NVidia & Knights Ferry) we have seen about 95% utilization which is very uncommon otherwise. In future will be modified to support FPGA devices also. MaxOut is an easy drop jar into MapReduce, Grid Frameworks, Scala Distributed Platforms to use the GPGPU.

projects.title: Banner ERP 9 (Platform and Framework)
projects.description: Develop scalable ERP platform which will serve as core infrastructure to build several applications which will be used by large universities.

projects.title: Architecture Driven Modernization (ADM) - Software Automation
projects.description: Use model driven approach to forward engineer legacy systems. Offer seamless toolset to design and implement modern enterprise applications by automating (generating code, documentation etc) thus improving overall quality and consistency of systems.

projects.title: UTest - Software Test Automation Framework
projects.description: UTest is a Test Automation infrastructure which involves storing test intents in a canonical repository and provide facilities to connect to any available test tool and infrastructure execute the testing process, re-concile results and provide analytics dashboard. All the artifacts (Tests, results, data, configuration) is stored in a canonical format (UML + U2TP - UML Testing Profile) and MDA tooling is used to run transformations on these assets to create executable tests depending on the tool, environment and configuration. The test execution progress is reported in near-real-time. The framework exposes a REST API for integrating with other SDLC tools.

projects.title: Connected Fleet
projects.description: * Connected Fleet Platform* Location Intelligence* Realtime Telemetry* Realtime Monitoring & Metering* Realtime communication* Fleet POS

I am passionate about innovation, technology, and financial inclusion, and I always strive to deliver value and excellence to PhonePe and its customers.

experience.title: Vendor Operations Manager
experience.description:
- Vendor Operations & Service Delivery Management:

Overseeing day-to-day vendor operations, metric tracking (CSAT, SLAs, Quality, Cost, etc.), reporting, and ensuring business objectives are met.

- Vendor Lifecycle Management: Leading vendor

selection, forecasting, resource planning, Business

Continuity Planning(BCP), and budget management.

-Process Excellence & Optimization: Ensuring

processes are documented, driving operational

efficiencies, reducing costs, identifying automation opportunities, and managing utilization.

- Governance & Compliance: Managing contractual

adherence(SLAS, penalties/incentives), risk

mitigation (data access, compliance)

co-employment guidelines, and financial governance (budgeting, payments).

- Stakeholder Management & Influence:

Collaborating with diverse cross-functional teams

(Product, Sourcing, GTM, HR, Legal, Finance), 

including senior executives, across a global, matrix environment.

- Relationship Management & Communication:Acting as a conduit between vendors and internal teams, managing escalations, communicating requirements effectively, and handling crucial conversations.

- Business Transformation & Change Leadership:

Driving programs to improve operational

effectiveness and efficiency, challenging the status quo, and leading change with empathy.

-Strategic Planning & Execution: Developing domain-level operations, partner, and scaling

strategies based on product insights and business needs; managing polarities between goals.

experience.title: Operations Team Lead
experience.description:

detailed_profile.name: Sanjana S
detailed_profile.position: Associate Manager | Payment Gateway Operations at PhonePe | Driving Strategic Payment Solutions
detailed_profile.about: With a Bachelor's in Computer Application from Annamalai University and a diploma in Computer Science from VET BVL Polytechnic, I am now leading a high-caliber escalation team at PhonePe. My core competencies revolve around managing complex issues, developing leadership skills, and enhancing team performance through effective KPIs and training modules. At PhonePe, our team's dedication to resolving RBI and critical escalations has streamlined the escalations process, showcasing our ability to work collaboratively with stakeholders for swift resolutions. We're committed to our culture of continuous improvement, driven by regular reviews and training that enrich our collective expertise, ensuring we bring diverse perspectives and a strong problem-solving ethos to every challenge.

positions.subtitle: PhonePe
positions.description: • Managing a high-end escalation team for RBI, Govt authorities, and legal escalations at PhonePe • Collaborating with leaders to efficiently resolve complex issues and implement strategic solutions for timely escalations. • Developing strong leadership and problem-solving skills in a fast-paced environment, tracking team performance and providing individual feedback for improvement. •Conducting Coaching plans and Performance Improvement plans wherever necessary •Preparing KPIs, process SOPs and training modules to maintain effectiveness •Arranging regular process refreshers, training sessions to improve performance •Part of Weekly/Monthly reviews and committee meetings highlighting the team metrics, performance and way forward •Part of internal and RBI audits, highlighting the complaints received and process handled •Ensuring strict adherence of TAT as per regulatory standards •Reviewing tickets on customer satisfaction metrics and collaborating with the stakeholders for changes required basis customer feedback/suggestions •Connecting with stakeholders to highlight the impact of their involvement in resolving customer queries and working towards improving user experience
positions.title: Team Lead
positions.description_html:
• Managing a high-end escalation team for RBI, Govt authorities, and legal escalations at PhonePe
• Collaborating with leaders to efficiently resolve complex issues and implement strategic solutions for timely escalations.
• Developing strong leadership and problem-solving skills in a fast-paced environment, tracking team performance and providing individual feedback for improvement.
•Conducting Coaching plans and Performance Improvement plans wherever necessary
•Preparing KPIs, process SOPs and training modules to maintain effectiveness
•Arranging regular process refreshers, training sessions to improve performance
•Part of Weekly/Monthly reviews and committee meetings highlighting the team metrics, performance and way forward
•Part of internal and RBI audits, highlighting the complaints received and process handled
•Ensuring strict adherence of TAT as per regulatory standards
•Reviewing tickets on customer satisfaction metrics and collaborating with the stakeholders for changes required basis customer feedback/suggestions
•Connecting with stakeholders to highlight the impact of their involvement in resolving customer queries and working towards improving user experience

positions.subtitle: PhonePe
positions.description: -In my role as a Senior Escalation Specialist at PhonePe, I handled escalations raised to L3 support and complaints to top leaders. -Core part of my role was to handle RBI escalations, complaints raised by customers in different Govt portal and Legal notices sent to the company -I ensured complete case studies of complaints, collaborated with stakeholders for priority closures, and fixed system issues. -Additionally, I prepared data for audits and worked on experience erosion to improve processes. -I was part of weekly reviews, highlighting the team performance, taking my supervisors through the metrics achieved -Handled escalation calls and prepared detailed RCAs of all the TAT breached complaints

-Core part of my role was to handle RBI escalations, complaints raised by customers in different Govt portal and Legal notices sent to the company
-I ensured complete case studies of complaints, collaborated with stakeholders for priority closures, and fixed system issues.
-Additionally, I prepared data for audits and worked on experience erosion to improve processes.
-I was part of weekly reviews, highlighting the team performance, taking my supervisors through the metrics achieved
-Handled escalation calls and prepared detailed RCAs of all the TAT breached complaints

positions.description: • Provided on-call resolution to customer tickets within the PhonePe application, ensuring end-to-end follow-up and closure on complaints received. • Identified process gaps and suggested improvements to enhance user experience, escalating edge cases for priority resolution. • Collaborated with stakeholders to address customer concerns, highlighting achievements in improving customer satisfaction and retention.
positions.title: Customer Service Specialist

• Collaborated with stakeholders to address customer concerns, highlighting achievements in improving customer satisfaction and retention.

detailed_profile.name: Swarnadeep Debnath
detailed_profile.position: Operation @phonepe | Product | Analytics | Building 0 -​>1 SaaS Product | Open for Opportunities
detailed_profile.about: Hi there! I'm Swarnadeep Debnath, working at PhonePe ops team and an aspiring product manager with a passion for blending design and business strategy to create user-focused solutions. Originally from West Bengal, India, I’m currently based in Bangalore, i have done Bachelor of Business Administration in finance and marketing and actively exploring the world of product management, UI/UX, and technology. Contributed to build a tiffin CRM SaaS product and was part of PM fellowship at product space, currently building a saas product from 0 -> 1. I’ve built my experience through individual and collaborative projects, honing a versatile set of design skills that include creative problem-solving and delivering high-quality, functional user experiences. I’m driven by the desire to create meaningful products that solve real-world problems while delivering value to users. #ProductManagement #UXDesign # businessstrategy #Innovation #AspiringPM #productplanning

recommendations: Savita Angadi “I was Navneet’s mentor during his tenure with TRDDC. I found him to be a hard worker and self-motivated. He was passionate about everything. He had good understanding of analytics. I recollect how much he was commitment towards his work. He is the best team player that I ever seen. Added to that he was good at managing the team as team lead too! He was one person that I can trust on any of the assignment that I am committed to. He was acquaint with state of art not only in analytics but across the fields. Quite hard to find a person like him. No doubt he will be the asset to the team. Looking forward to work with him again. ”

Naren Chittar “I managed Navneet for over an year. He helped build eBay's first autocomplete system. He then moved on to improving our query recommendation product and within a few weeks fixed the most common complaints pertaining to the quality of the system. What this says is that Navneet is a very versatile applied researcher and can move between products very easily. He can also identify what is important in a product from a user's point of view -- many engineers and applied researchers cannot do that. He is also a very level headed, calm and collected person. If you have a stressful, hi priority project you want to assign, you can be sure that Navneet will handle it in a very balanced and mature way all through out. He was always the first person for anyone in the team to go to when they had questions or needed feedback.”

He has a bright future and I always look forward to work with him in future.”

positions.subtitle: PhonePe
positions.description: Area Sales Manager comes with the responsibility of handling both direct team and indirect team size around 20 to 25 people. Which drives both sales and post sales services hand on hand, to deliver this responsibility. I’m taking care of cross functional teams of both sales, services and operations. Handling a mixture of team of multiple roles like BDA, BDE, TSE and exclusive agents for services, this gives lot of flexibility and confidence to manage multiple task at same time and also it’s better opportunity to gain knowledge across different departments. This role have responsibility of inventory planning and managing inventory with team, so that sales and services teams have sufficient resources and work most effectively. This role have responsibility of hiring building, managing and training team to gain maximum productivity from each individual and ensure them to have a career progression to next levels. Handling a team of sales is always about revenue generation and gaining market share over the competition.

detailed_profile.name: Mohammed Aqil
detailed_profile.position: Zonal distribution head @ PhonePe | PGDM in Marketing
detailed_profile.about: As the State Head at PhonePe, I lead the sales and distribution strategy for the fastest growing digital payments platform in India. I manage a team of over 300 sales executives and oversee the expansion of PhonePe's network across multiple channels and segments. I am responsible for driving revenue growth, market share, customer acquisition, and retention, as well as ensuring compliance and quality standards. I have over six years of sales experience in various industries, such as FMCG, pharma, and consumer goods. Before joining PhonePe, I was a Senior Area Sales Executive at Reckitt, where I grew the modern trade business for Telangana, accounting for an annual turnover of 120 Cr. I also worked as a Senior Territory Sales Manager at Reckitt, where I handled the CNC and B2B business, delivering top-line, market share, consumer promos, customer relations, brand and category growths, and visibility in stores. I have a PGDM in Marketing from Birla Institute of Management and Technology, and an Engineer's Degree in Electrical and Electronics Engineering from Dhanekula Institute of Engineering and Technology. I am passionate about sales and distribution, and I enjoy solving complex business problems and creating value for customers and stakeholders. I have strong skills in research, customer service, public speaking, and leadership, and I am fluent in English, Hindi and Telugu. I am always eager to learn new things and grow along with the Ecosystem

detailed_profile.name: Mohammed Aqil
detailed_profile.position: Zonal distribution head @ PhonePe | PGDM in Marketing
detailed_profile.about: As the State Head at PhonePe, I lead the sales and distribution strategy for the fastest growing digital payments platform in India. I manage a team of over 300 sales executives and oversee the expansion of PhonePe's network across multiple channels and segments. I am responsible for driving revenue growth, market share, customer acquisition, and retention, as well as ensuring compliance and quality standards. I have over six years of sales experience in various industries, such as FMCG, pharma, and consumer goods. Before joining PhonePe, I was a Senior Area Sales Executive at Reckitt, where I grew the modern trade business for Telangana, accounting for an annual turnover of 120 Cr. I also worked as a Senior Territory Sales Manager at Reckitt, where I handled the CNC and B2B business, delivering top-line, market share, consumer promos, customer relations, brand and category growths, and visibility in stores. I have a PGDM in Marketing from Birla Institute of Management and Technology, and an Engineer's Degree in Electrical and Electronics Engineering from Dhanekula Institute of Engineering and Technology. I am passionate about sales and distribution, and I enjoy solving complex business problems and creating value for customers and stakeholders. I have strong skills in research, customer service, public speaking, and leadership, and I am fluent in English, Hindi and Telugu. I am always eager to learn new things and grow along with the Ecosystem

detailed_profile.name: CA Rashmi Bhat
detailed_profile.about: I am a Chartered Accountant with a passion for the finance domain and a keen interest in Financial Planning & Analysis. I have qualified as a CA in May 2023, after completing my final examination and my practical training from The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India. During my articleship, I gained valuable experience in performing ratio analysis, special audits, financial accounting, and tax compliance for various clients. I contributed to the preparation and presentation of financial statements, reports, and recommendations, ensuring accuracy, completeness, and compliance with the relevant standards and regulations. I also collaborated with senior auditors, managers, and partners, learning from their expertise and feedback, and supporting them in delivering high-quality services and solutions. My goal is to leverage my skills and knowledge to contribute to the success of financial organizations, analyze financial data, and provide strategic insights for better decision-making. I am eager to learn new skills, explore new opportunities, and take on new challenges in the FP&A and Business Finance Domain. I am also a bibliophile, a stock market enthusiast, and a chess player, who enjoys reading, researching, and playing in my spare time.

recommendations: Sridhar Desikan “Rashmi has been deputed by KPCA. Having worked closely with Rashmi for almost a year. I have been consistently impressed by her exceptional analytical skills, attention to detail, and dedication to achieving collection targets. During their time at InMobi, Rashmi consistently demonstrated a strong understanding of the collections process and an ability to effectively analyze customer accounts. She has proven track record of successfully identifying delinquent accounts, implementing appropriate collection strategies, and maximizing recovery rates. Here are some key attributes that make collect an outstanding Collection Analyst: 1. Analytical Skills: Rashmi possesses excellent analytical skills, allowing them to thoroughly evaluate customer accounts, identify patterns, and develop effective collection strategies. They have a keen eye for detail and are skilled at interpreting financial data to make informed decisions. 2. Strong Communication: Rashmi communicates effectively and professionally with customers, colleagues, and stakeholders. They are adept at explaining complex financial matters in a clear and concise manner, which helps in resolving disputes and negotiating payment arrangements. 3. Results-Oriented: Rashmi consistently achieves and exceeds collection targets. They are highly motivated, proactive, and resourceful in their approach to collecting outstanding payments. Their ability to prioritize tasks and handle a large volume of accounts ensures timely and efficient collections. 4. Adaptability: Rashmi is quick to adapt to changing circumstances and is comfortable working in a fast-paced environment. They are open to learning new collection techniques and technologies, which enables them to continuously improve their collection strategies. 5. Relationship Building: Rashmi understands the importance of building strong relationships with customers. They approach collection efforts with empathy and professionalism, ensuring that customers feel valued and are more likely to cooperate in resolving their payment issues. Based on their exceptional skills and experience, I have no doubt that Rashmi will be a valuable asset to your organization. Their dedication to achieving results, attention to detail, and ability to build relationships will greatly contribute to the success of your organization. I highly recommend Rashmi, for any organization and she will excel in her role . If you require any further information or would like to discuss their qualifications in more detail, please do not hesitate to contact me.”

detailed_profile.name: Mohammed Aqil
detailed_profile.position: Zonal distribution head @ PhonePe | PGDM in Marketing
detailed_profile.about: As the State Head at PhonePe, I lead the sales and distribution strategy for the fastest growing digital payments platform in India. I manage a team of over 300 sales executives and oversee the expansion of PhonePe's network across multiple channels and segments. I am responsible for driving revenue growth, market share, customer acquisition, and retention, as well as ensuring compliance and quality standards. I have over six years of sales experience in various industries, such as FMCG, pharma, and consumer goods. Before joining PhonePe, I was a Senior Area Sales Executive at Reckitt, where I grew the modern trade business for Telangana, accounting for an annual turnover of 120 Cr. I also worked as a Senior Territory Sales Manager at Reckitt, where I handled the CNC and B2B business, delivering top-line, market share, consumer promos, customer relations, brand and category growths, and visibility in stores. I have a PGDM in Marketing from Birla Institute of Management and Technology, and an Engineer's Degree in Electrical and Electronics Engineering from Dhanekula Institute of Engineering and Technology. I am passionate about sales and distribution, and I enjoy solving complex business problems and creating value for customers and stakeholders. I have strong skills in research, customer service, public speaking, and leadership, and I am fluent in English, Hindi and Telugu. I am always eager to learn new things and grow along with the Ecosystem

detailed_profile.name: Rahul Singh Makhan
detailed_profile.about: A driven leader with over 14 years of experience in the BPO/KPO, Customer service and Digital Marketing industry characterized by strategic vision and decisive tactical execution; managing business challenges with innovation, experience & credibility.

experience.title: Vendor Operations Manager
experience.description:
- Vendor Operations & Service Delivery Management:

Overseeing day-to-day vendor operations, metric tracking (CSAT, SLAs, Quality, Cost, etc.), reporting, and ensuring business objectives are met.

- Vendor Lifecycle Management: Leading vendor

selection, forecasting, resource planning, Business

Continuity Planning(BCP), and budget management.

-Process Excellence & Optimization: Ensuring

processes are documented, driving operational

efficiencies, reducing costs, identifying automation opportunities, and managing utilization.

- Governance & Compliance: Managing contractual

adherence(SLAS, penalties/incentives), risk

mitigation (data access, compliance)

co-employment guidelines, and financial governance (budgeting, payments).

- Stakeholder Management & Influence:

Collaborating with diverse cross-functional teams

(Product, Sourcing, GTM, HR, Legal, Finance), 

including senior executives, across a global, matrix environment.

- Relationship Management & Communication:Acting as a conduit between vendors and internal teams, managing escalations, communicating requirements effectively, and handling crucial conversations.

- Business Transformation & Change Leadership:

Driving programs to improve operational

effectiveness and efficiency, challenging the status quo, and leading change with empathy.

-Strategic Planning & Execution: Developing domain-level operations, partner, and scaling

strategies based on product insights and business needs; managing polarities between goals.
experience.description_html:
- Vendor Operations & Service Delivery Management:
Overseeing day-to-day vendor operations, metric tracking (CSAT, SLAs, Quality, Cost, etc.), reporting, and ensuring business objectives are met.
- Vendor Lifecycle Management: Leading vendor
selection, forecasting, resource planning, Business
Continuity Planning(BCP), and budget management.
-Process Excellence & Optimization: Ensuring
processes are documented, driving operational
efficiencies, reducing costs, identifying automation opportunities, and managing utilization.
- Governance & Compliance: Managing contractual
adherence(SLAS, penalties/incentives), risk
mitigation (data access, compliance)
co-employment guidelines, and financial governance (budgeting, payments).
- Stakeholder Management & Influence:
Collaborating with diverse cross-functional teams
(Product, Sourcing, GTM, HR, Legal, Finance),
including senior executives, across a global, matrix environment.
- Relationship Management & Communication:Acting as a conduit between vendors and internal teams, managing escalations, communicating requirements effectively, and handling crucial conversations.
- Business Transformation & Change Leadership:
Driving programs to improve operational
effectiveness and efficiency, challenging the status quo, and leading change with empathy.
-Strategic Planning & Execution: Developing domain-level operations, partner, and scaling
strategies based on product insights and business needs; managing polarities between goals.

experience.title: Data Scientist Intern
experience.description:
• I worked on the application of behavioral sciences using Data Sciences to solve hard problems, social and commercial. 

• I worked on two projects ﬁrst being on Road Safety analytics and other on Emotions/Appraisal Tagging.

 • I used R as for building functions and identifying potential black spot chainages in Road safety project for Chennai-Nashri Tunnel also Known as Patnitop Tunnel in the Indian state of Jammu and Kashmir. 

• For second project we developed Text analytics models like Naive Bayes model and SVM model for Sentimental analysis which got trained by the Client data processed by fellow Emotional architects and was tested for further data.

projects.title: HR Analytics
projects.description: Predicting the employees who will leave the company by training on a data set and then testing on that data set only to compute the probability. Advance logistic regression is used for prediction.

projects.title: Image segmentation
projects.description: In computer vision, image segmentation is the process of partitioning a digital image into multiple segments (sets of pixels, also known as super-pixels). The goal of segmentation is to simplify and/or change the representation of an image into something that is more meaningful and easier to analyze. I have used hierarchical clustering and K-means Clustering for segmentation.

projects.title: Sentimental Analysis
projects.description: Sentiment analysis (sometimes known as opinion mining or emotion AI) refers to the use of natural language processing, text analysis, computational linguistics, and biometrics to systematically identify, extract, quantify, and study effective states and subjective information. Sentiment analysis is widely applied to voice of the customer materials such as reviews and survey responses, online and social media, and healthcare materials for applications that range from marketing to customer service to clinical medicine.

detailed_profile.name: Raju Naik
detailed_profile.position: Product Engineer @ Vxceed Solutions | SQL • Python • PowerBI • Tableau • AWS QuickSight • Excel • Statistical Analysis
detailed_profile.about: Hi there! 👋 I’m Raju Naik, I’m a Data Analyst at PhonePe, currently working on the Health Insurance product, with hands-on experience in data-driven product optimization, funnel tracking, and customer retention analysis. In my current role, I work closely with product managers, engineers, and business teams to analyze user journeys — from app launch to policy purchase. Using SQL and Python (Pandas), I track funnel metrics, calculate drop-off rates, and surface insights that directly influence product and UX decisions. One such data-driven insight helped uncover post-payment drop-offs caused by policy issuance delays, leading to a quick product fix. I also dive deep into API logs and policy data across partners like HDFC, ICICI, and Niva to identify technical blockers. My analysis has led to backend improvements, like enabling a document reupload feature, improving overall success rates for issued policies. Beyond new user acquisition, I focus on customer retention through persistency and renewal analysis, using behavioral data to inform re-engagement strategies and product tweaks. I’ve also contributed to detecting UX visibility issues post-app updates and proposed intuitive improvements that were prioritized in sprint planning. Throughout, I collaborate cross-functionally to ensure our roadmap reflects both user needs and business goals, balancing strategic direction with real-time data insights. I'm passionate about using data to tell powerful user stories, improve products, and drive outcomes that matter. Outside of work, I’m deeply interested in self-growth, music, automobiles, and current affairs. I’m also continuously upskilling in areas like AI, ML, NLP, and MLOps to strengthen my analytics and product sense. Excited to connect, collaborate, and grow with like-minded data and product professionals. Let’s use data to make a meaningful impact! 🔗 GitHub: https://github.com/RajuNaik29

experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description:
As an Data Analyst at Phonepe, I manage and update the MIS for insurance partners, ensuring the accuracy and timeliness of insurance-related data. My responsibilities include identifying and highlighting customer data where insurance policies have not been issued, coordinating with providers to resolve these issues, and ensuring the process runs smoothly.


I also highlight to providers whose insurance applications have been rejected due to internal issues such as premium mismatches, document discrepancies, KYC updates etc. In these cases, I work closely with partners to address and rectify the problems.


I use SQL to extract and analyze data, supporting decision-making processes and ensuring operational efficiency. In addition to these responsibilities, I regularly interact with cross-functional teams to streamline operations and enhance collaboration across departments.

detailed_profile.name: Prabhat Bhattacharya
detailed_profile.position: Business Analyst - TCS| PhonePe| General Secretary Of Placement(MBA-24)- Army Institute Of Management Kolkata| MBA (Marketing & Operations)| B.Tech (Civil Engineering)
detailed_profile.about: As a Business Analyst at Tata Consultancy Services, I apply my marketing analytics expertise and MBA knowledge to deliver quality solutions for various clients and projects. I use Office 365, Jile, and Prime tools to implement test cases, execute tests, and identify critical issues using agile methodologies. I also collaborate with the value streams and marketing team to inform and develop marketing strategies based on data analysis and interpretation. Before joining TCS, I worked as a Marketing Analyst at the same company, where I performed behavioral analysis and market research for different business opportunities and development. I also worked as a Key Account Executive at PhonePe, a leading digital payments platform, where I managed and grew a portfolio of key merchants and partners. I completed my internship in digital marketing, market research, business development, and content strategy at various organizations. I hold a MBA degree in Marketing and Operations from Army Institute of Management, Kolkata, where I was the General Secretary of Placement. I also have a B.Tech degree in Civil Engineering from Narula Institute of Technology, and certifications in Auto CAD and STADD Pro from Bentley Systems. I am confident, honest, sincere, organized, punctual, and affable. I enjoy learning new skills and technologies, and I am always eager to take on new challenges and opportunities. I value teamwork, innovation, and customer satisfaction. My goal is to leverage my education, experience, and skills to create value for my clients and company, and to grow as a professional and a leader.

experience.title: Vendor Operations Manager
experience.description:
- Vendor Operations & Service Delivery Management:

Overseeing day-to-day vendor operations, metric tracking (CSAT, SLAs, Quality, Cost, etc.), reporting, and ensuring business objectives are met.

- Vendor Lifecycle Management: Leading vendor

selection, forecasting, resource planning, Business

Continuity Planning(BCP), and budget management.

-Process Excellence & Optimization: Ensuring

processes are documented, driving operational

efficiencies, reducing costs, identifying automation opportunities, and managing utilization.

- Governance & Compliance: Managing contractual

adherence(SLAS, penalties/incentives), risk

mitigation (data access, compliance)

co-employment guidelines, and financial governance (budgeting, payments).

- Stakeholder Management & Influence:

Collaborating with diverse cross-functional teams

(Product, Sourcing, GTM, HR, Legal, Finance), 

including senior executives, across a global, matrix environment.

- Relationship Management & Communication:Acting as a conduit between vendors and internal teams, managing escalations, communicating requirements effectively, and handling crucial conversations.

- Business Transformation & Change Leadership:

Driving programs to improve operational

effectiveness and efficiency, challenging the status quo, and leading change with empathy.

-Strategic Planning & Execution: Developing domain-level operations, partner, and scaling

strategies based on product insights and business needs; managing polarities between goals.

detailed_profile.name: Mohammed Aqil
detailed_profile.position: Zonal distribution head @ PhonePe | PGDM in Marketing
detailed_profile.about: As the State Head at PhonePe, I lead the sales and distribution strategy for the fastest growing digital payments platform in India. I manage a team of over 300 sales executives and oversee the expansion of PhonePe's network across multiple channels and segments. I am responsible for driving revenue growth, market share, customer acquisition, and retention, as well as ensuring compliance and quality standards. I have over six years of sales experience in various industries, such as FMCG, pharma, and consumer goods. Before joining PhonePe, I was a Senior Area Sales Executive at Reckitt, where I grew the modern trade business for Telangana, accounting for an annual turnover of 120 Cr. I also worked as a Senior Territory Sales Manager at Reckitt, where I handled the CNC and B2B business, delivering top-line, market share, consumer promos, customer relations, brand and category growths, and visibility in stores. I have a PGDM in Marketing from Birla Institute of Management and Technology, and an Engineer's Degree in Electrical and Electronics Engineering from Dhanekula Institute of Engineering and Technology. I am passionate about sales and distribution, and I enjoy solving complex business problems and creating value for customers and stakeholders. I have strong skills in research, customer service, public speaking, and leadership, and I am fluent in English, Hindi and Telugu. I am always eager to learn new things and grow along with the Ecosystem

detailed_profile.name: Shankar Jayaraman
detailed_profile.position: Head of CX Digital Transformation @ PhonePe | Project Management, Leadership, Startup, Customer experience
detailed_profile.about: With over 13 years of distinguished leadership in digital adoption and customer success, I've pioneered transformative strategies for small and medium businesses, significantly boosting revenue growth and market expansion. At the heart of Chennai's tech scene, I've steered cross-functional teams towards achieving organizational objectives, expertly managing over 8000 unique accounts annually to not just meet but exceed targets. My tenure has been marked by a series of successful digital adoption initiatives, culminating in a 5% reduction in churn and achieving a customer satisfaction (CSAT) score of 92%. I led the largest implementation project in the company's history, demonstrating my ability to handle high-stake projects with zero escalations. I specialize in strategic project management, customer success and advocacy, and spearheading digital adoption programs. My knack for fostering cross-functional collaboration and driving change has consistently resulted in seamless project implementations and innovative solutions that keep pace with market trends. Educationally grounded with a PGPM FLEX from the Great Lakes Institute of Management and a B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering, my foundation in technical and managerial disciplines underpins my strategic approach to project leadership and customer engagement. My professional journey is characterized by a relentless pursuit of excellence, a deep commitment to driving customer success, and a visionary approach to digital transformation. matched.match_rationale: Raju is a Data Analyst at PhonePe, which is a related role within the same department.

detailed_profile.name: Raju Naik
detailed_profile.position: Product Engineer @ Vxceed Solutions | SQL • Python • PowerBI • Tableau • AWS QuickSight • Excel • Statistical Analysis
detailed_profile.about: Hi there! 👋 I’m Raju Naik, I’m a Data Analyst at PhonePe, currently working on the Health Insurance product, with hands-on experience in data-driven product optimization, funnel tracking, and customer retention analysis. In my current role, I work closely with product managers, engineers, and business teams to analyze user journeys — from app launch to policy purchase. Using SQL and Python (Pandas), I track funnel metrics, calculate drop-off rates, and surface insights that directly influence product and UX decisions. One such data-driven insight helped uncover post-payment drop-offs caused by policy issuance delays, leading to a quick product fix. I also dive deep into API logs and policy data across partners like HDFC, ICICI, and Niva to identify technical blockers. My analysis has led to backend improvements, like enabling a document reupload feature, improving overall success rates for issued policies. Beyond new user acquisition, I focus on customer retention through persistency and renewal analysis, using behavioral data to inform re-engagement strategies and product tweaks. I’ve also contributed to detecting UX visibility issues post-app updates and proposed intuitive improvements that were prioritized in sprint planning. Throughout, I collaborate cross-functionally to ensure our roadmap reflects both user needs and business goals, balancing strategic direction with real-time data insights. I'm passionate about using data to tell powerful user stories, improve products, and drive outcomes that matter. Outside of work, I’m deeply interested in self-growth, music, automobiles, and current affairs. I’m also continuously upskilling in areas like AI, ML, NLP, and MLOps to strengthen my analytics and product sense. Excited to connect, collaborate, and grow with like-minded data and product professionals. Let’s use data to make a meaningful impact! 🔗 GitHub: https://github.com/RajuNaik29

experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description:
As an Data Analyst at Phonepe, I manage and update the MIS for insurance partners, ensuring the accuracy and timeliness of insurance-related data. My responsibilities include identifying and highlighting customer data where insurance policies have not been issued, coordinating with providers to resolve these issues, and ensuring the process runs smoothly.


I also highlight to providers whose insurance applications have been rejected due to internal issues such as premium mismatches, document discrepancies, KYC updates etc. In these cases, I work closely with partners to address and rectify the problems.


I use SQL to extract and analyze data, supporting decision-making processes and ensuring operational efficiency. In addition to these responsibilities, I regularly interact with cross-functional teams to streamline operations and enhance collaboration across departments.

detailed_profile.name: Mohammed Aqil
detailed_profile.position: Zonal distribution head @ PhonePe | PGDM in Marketing
detailed_profile.about: As the State Head at PhonePe, I lead the sales and distribution strategy for the fastest growing digital payments platform in India. I manage a team of over 300 sales executives and oversee the expansion of PhonePe's network across multiple channels and segments. I am responsible for driving revenue growth, market share, customer acquisition, and retention, as well as ensuring compliance and quality standards. I have over six years of sales experience in various industries, such as FMCG, pharma, and consumer goods. Before joining PhonePe, I was a Senior Area Sales Executive at Reckitt, where I grew the modern trade business for Telangana, accounting for an annual turnover of 120 Cr. I also worked as a Senior Territory Sales Manager at Reckitt, where I handled the CNC and B2B business, delivering top-line, market share, consumer promos, customer relations, brand and category growths, and visibility in stores. I have a PGDM in Marketing from Birla Institute of Management and Technology, and an Engineer's Degree in Electrical and Electronics Engineering from Dhanekula Institute of Engineering and Technology. I am passionate about sales and distribution, and I enjoy solving complex business problems and creating value for customers and stakeholders. I have strong skills in research, customer service, public speaking, and leadership, and I am fluent in English, Hindi and Telugu. I am always eager to learn new things and grow along with the Ecosystem

detailed_profile.name: Mohammed Aqil
detailed_profile.position: Zonal distribution head @ PhonePe | PGDM in Marketing
detailed_profile.about: As the State Head at PhonePe, I lead the sales and distribution strategy for the fastest growing digital payments platform in India. I manage a team of over 300 sales executives and oversee the expansion of PhonePe's network across multiple channels and segments. I am responsible for driving revenue growth, market share, customer acquisition, and retention, as well as ensuring compliance and quality standards. I have over six years of sales experience in various industries, such as FMCG, pharma, and consumer goods. Before joining PhonePe, I was a Senior Area Sales Executive at Reckitt, where I grew the modern trade business for Telangana, accounting for an annual turnover of 120 Cr. I also worked as a Senior Territory Sales Manager at Reckitt, where I handled the CNC and B2B business, delivering top-line, market share, consumer promos, customer relations, brand and category growths, and visibility in stores. I have a PGDM in Marketing from Birla Institute of Management and Technology, and an Engineer's Degree in Electrical and Electronics Engineering from Dhanekula Institute of Engineering and Technology. I am passionate about sales and distribution, and I enjoy solving complex business problems and creating value for customers and stakeholders. I have strong skills in research, customer service, public speaking, and leadership, and I am fluent in English, Hindi and Telugu. I am always eager to learn new things and grow along with the Ecosystem

experience.title: Data Scientist Intern
experience.description:
• I worked on the application of behavioral sciences using Data Sciences to solve hard problems, social and commercial. 

• I worked on two projects ﬁrst being on Road Safety analytics and other on Emotions/Appraisal Tagging.

 • I used R as for building functions and identifying potential black spot chainages in Road safety project for Chennai-Nashri Tunnel also Known as Patnitop Tunnel in the Indian state of Jammu and Kashmir. 

• For second project we developed Text analytics models like Naive Bayes model and SVM model for Sentimental analysis which got trained by the Client data processed by fellow Emotional architects and was tested for further data.

projects.title: HR Analytics
projects.description: Predicting the employees who will leave the company by training on a data set and then testing on that data set only to compute the probability. Advance logistic regression is used for prediction.

projects.title: Image segmentation
projects.description: In computer vision, image segmentation is the process of partitioning a digital image into multiple segments (sets of pixels, also known as super-pixels). The goal of segmentation is to simplify and/or change the representation of an image into something that is more meaningful and easier to analyze. I have used hierarchical clustering and K-means Clustering for segmentation.

projects.title: Field trip
projects.description: Discovered various Rocks In Rishikesh area , learned use of GPS ,Geological compass to measure Dip and strike of bedding plane and also studied various folds,joints and faults

projects.title: Sentimental Analysis
projects.description: Sentiment analysis (sometimes known as opinion mining or emotion AI) refers to the use of natural language processing, text analysis, computational linguistics, and biometrics to systematically identify, extract, quantify, and study effective states and subjective information. Sentiment analysis is widely applied to voice of the customer materials such as reviews and survey responses, online and social media, and healthcare materials for applications that range from marketing to customer service to clinical medicine.

detailed_profile.name: Mohammed Aqil
detailed_profile.position: Zonal distribution head @ PhonePe | PGDM in Marketing
detailed_profile.about: As the State Head at PhonePe, I lead the sales and distribution strategy for the fastest growing digital payments platform in India. I manage a team of over 300 sales executives and oversee the expansion of PhonePe's network across multiple channels and segments. I am responsible for driving revenue growth, market share, customer acquisition, and retention, as well as ensuring compliance and quality standards. I have over six years of sales experience in various industries, such as FMCG, pharma, and consumer goods. Before joining PhonePe, I was a Senior Area Sales Executive at Reckitt, where I grew the modern trade business for Telangana, accounting for an annual turnover of 120 Cr. I also worked as a Senior Territory Sales Manager at Reckitt, where I handled the CNC and B2B business, delivering top-line, market share, consumer promos, customer relations, brand and category growths, and visibility in stores. I have a PGDM in Marketing from Birla Institute of Management and Technology, and an Engineer's Degree in Electrical and Electronics Engineering from Dhanekula Institute of Engineering and Technology. I am passionate about sales and distribution, and I enjoy solving complex business problems and creating value for customers and stakeholders. I have strong skills in research, customer service, public speaking, and leadership, and I am fluent in English, Hindi and Telugu. I am always eager to learn new things and grow along with the Ecosystem

experience.title: Vendor Operations Manager
experience.description:
- Vendor Operations & Service Delivery Management:

Overseeing day-to-day vendor operations, metric tracking (CSAT, SLAs, Quality, Cost, etc.), reporting, and ensuring business objectives are met.

- Vendor Lifecycle Management: Leading vendor

selection, forecasting, resource planning, Business

Continuity Planning(BCP), and budget management.

-Process Excellence & Optimization: Ensuring

processes are documented, driving operational

efficiencies, reducing costs, identifying automation opportunities, and managing utilization.

- Governance & Compliance: Managing contractual

adherence(SLAS, penalties/incentives), risk

mitigation (data access, compliance)

co-employment guidelines, and financial governance (budgeting, payments).

- Stakeholder Management & Influence:

Collaborating with diverse cross-functional teams

(Product, Sourcing, GTM, HR, Legal, Finance), 

including senior executives, across a global, matrix environment.

- Relationship Management & Communication:Acting as a conduit between vendors and internal teams, managing escalations, communicating requirements effectively, and handling crucial conversations.

- Business Transformation & Change Leadership:

Driving programs to improve operational

effectiveness and efficiency, challenging the status quo, and leading change with empathy.

-Strategic Planning & Execution: Developing domain-level operations, partner, and scaling

strategies based on product insights and business needs; managing polarities between goals.

detailed_profile.name: Shone Antony
detailed_profile.about: As a CA Finalist professional in my final year of articleship, I bring a robust understanding of finance and compliance. I spent 22 months at Phillipos & Co., specializing in audit and taxation, where I developed a strong foundation in financial regulations and practices. Currently, I'm enhancing my expertise at PhonePe as a BFSI Compliance Trainee. Here, I actively contribute to compliance functions across their lending and insurance businesses, with occasional involvement in the stockbroking business. This role allows me to apply my analytical skills in a dynamic fintech environment and deepen my knowledge of the regulatory landscape. Parallel to my professional journey, I'm pursuing a B.Com from IGNOU, further solidifying my academic background in commerce. I am passionate about ensuring regulatory adherence and am eager to leverage my combined experience in audit, taxation, and compliance to contribute to a challenging and growth-oriented role.

I manage a team of over 300 sales executives and oversee the expansion of PhonePe's network across multiple channels and segments. I am responsible for driving revenue growth, market share, customer acquisition, and retention, as well as ensuring compliance and quality standards. I have over six years of sales experience in various industries, such as FMCG, pharma, and consumer goods. Before joining PhonePe, I was a Senior Area Sales Executive at Reckitt, where I grew the modern trade business for Telangana, accounting for an annual turnover of 120 Cr. I also worked as a Senior Territory Sales Manager at Reckitt, where I handled the CNC and B2B business, delivering top-line, market share, consumer promos, customer relations, brand and category growths, and visibility in stores. I have a PGDM in Marketing from Birla Institute of Management and Technology, and an Engineer's Degree in Electrical and Electronics Engineering from Dhanekula Institute of Engineering and Technology. I am passionate about sales and distribution, and I enjoy solving complex business problems and creating value for customers and stakeholders. I have strong skills in research, customer service, public speaking, and leadership, and I am fluent in English, Hindi and Telugu. I am always eager to learn new things and grow along with the Ecosystem

positions.description: Area Sales Manager comes with the responsibility of handling both direct team and indirect team size around 20 to 25 people.
